title: Do jungle monters and cs have armour and magic resistance?
body:
Title says it all. Im wondering if jungle monsters have armour and magic resistance. Basically if i take Magic pen runes or armour pen runes will i deal more damage to cs or jungle monsters?

thanks

replies.body:
Yes they do.

Red buff is more resistant to magic damage than physical, and Blue is more resistant to physical than magic.

Normal lane minions have 0 resistances, but penetration will still work on them, reducing their resistance below 0. _(to my knowledge at least)_

Super minions actually have negative magic resist.
'Reduction' works on them.  Penetration wont take them below zero, it doesn't do that for anyone.
